def sieve_of_eratosthenes(n):
    """Generate a list of prime numbers up to n using the Sieve of Eratosthenes."""
    is_prime = [True] * (n + 1)
    p = 2
    while (p * p <= n):
        if is_prime[p]:
            for i in range(p * p, n + 1, p):
                is_prime[i] = False
        p += 1
    return [p for p in range(2, n + 1) if is_prime[p]]

# Increase the upper bound for the 1000th prime number
import math
upper_bound = int(1000 * math.log(1000) * 2)
primes = sieve_of_eratosthenes(upper_bound)

# Find the 1000th prime number
prime_1000 = primes[999]
prime_1000
